mapper.select: select a.* from tb_menu a JOIN tb_role_menu b on a.menu_id = b.mid join tb_role c on b.rid = c.rid join tb_user d on c.rid = d.rid where d.username = #{value} and a.type = 'MU'
select a.menu_id from tb_menu a join tb_role_menu b on a.menu_id = b.mid join tb_role c on b.rid = c.rid where c.rid = #{rid} and a.pid = #{menuId} and a.type = 'BT'

SELECT a.menu_name authenName, a.url url, case when a.type = 'MU' AND a.pid is null then 1 when a.type = 'MU' and a.pid is not null then 2 when a.type = 'BT' and a.pid is not null then 3 end `level` FROM tb_menu a
